attributes.action: restrict MP's to having one paid job only, that of being an MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst serving an elected term MP's should resign all other paid positions of employment. They are paid well and we are entitled to have them working for us full-time. They can choose between doing the job to which they are elected or having another career but not both. Any directorships, etc can be taken up when they cease to be an MP and not before.
